hadiths.text: Umm Salamah said:A women came to her, this is according to the version of the former tradition. I asked the Prophet (May peace be upon him) a similar question (as in the former tradition). But this version adds: “And wring out your locks after every handful of water”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَرْأَةِ هَلْ تَنْقُضُ شَعَرَهَا عِنْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Undoing (The Braids Of) Her Hair While Performing Ghusl
